MS MCQs

    Explore Microsoft Dynamics 365 Fraud Protection

    »

    1. How does Dynamics 365 Fraud Protection prevent unauthorized account creation, account takeovers, and fraudulent account access?

      By providing merchants the capability to assess the risk of attempts to create new accounts and attempts to log in on a merchants ecosystem.

      By providing risk assessment on account log-in only

      By using AI models to establish real-time risk assessments and a scorecard to monitor fraud protection effectiveness and trends in your ecosystem.


    2. What does pairing Dynamics 365 Fraud Protection with an acceptance booster reduce?

      Transactions flagged as fraudulent or suspicious and triggers a banks fraud detection system.

      Fraudulent attempts of account access by enabling device fingerprinting.

      Wrongful rejections and boost acceptance rates with banks.


    3. What does the loss prevention feature in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Fraud Protection allow store managers and fraud investigators to use the reports to focus on?

      The types of payment methods used.

      Anomalous entities that might indicate fraud.

      The amount of sales and transactions made during a certain period of time.
